definition: to poison (harm with a toxic substance)/to poison (people's minds)/poisoning
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Ashfalls can suffocate plants and poison livestock.
sentences.chinese: 降落的火山灰能悶死植物，毒害牲畜。

sentences.english: The Carthaginian peace of Versailles had by then poisoned everything.
sentences.chinese: 凡爾賽的迦太基和平毒害了每個人。

sentences.english: The primary site of Al toxicity locates in root apices.
sentences.chinese: 鋁毒害的最初作用位點在根尖。

sentences.english: Create a non-toxic community activities to ensure that the side pure land.
sentences.chinese: 開展創建無毒害社區活動確保一方淨土。

sentences.english: It was poisoned and Snow White fell to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 它被毒害，而且雪白色落到地板。

sentences.english: Desire destroys devotion, anger annihilates wisdom, and greed poisons every action.
sentences.chinese: 慾望摧毀奉獻，生氣消滅智慧，貪婪毒害每一行爲。

sentences.english: The heart knows no possessiveness but the mind contaminates it, poisons it.
sentences.chinese: 心從沒有佔有的概念，但是頭腦卻污染毒害了它。

sentences.english: It is not known whether Cubicin passes into breast milk or if it could harm a nursing baby.
sentences.chinese: 目前，尚不明確克必信是否能通過母乳毒害嬰兒。

sentences.english: Anger repressed can poison a relationship as surely as the cruelest words.
sentences.chinese: 被壓抑的憤怒確實會像最殘酷的字眼一樣毒害關係。

sentences.english: As policy, these notions are poisonous.
sentences.chinese: 作爲政策，這些陳腐觀念將極具毒害性。

sentences.english: Begum was poisoned by the beautiful water she had faithfully pumped.
sentences.chinese: 貝根是被她終生信任而汲取的清泉所毒害。

sentences.english: The characteristics of dustless compounded lead salt stabilizer are good, and without dust poison.
sentences.chinese: 無塵複合鉛鹽穩定劑性能優良，無粉塵毒害。

sentences.english: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, [and] from the noisome pestilence.
sentences.chinese: 他必救你脫離捕鳥人的網羅，和毒害的瘟疫。

sentences.english: He has found that smoke and toxic gases can be transported swiftly up through the atrium.
sentences.chinese: 他發現煙和毒害性氣體可通過中庭迅速向上傳播。

sentences.english: Ubiquity might not be toxic to authenticity, but it certainly dilutes it.
sentences.chinese: 普遍性或許不至於毒害原真性，但確實會削弱它。

sentences.english: There are diseases and radiation poisoning spreading all over the country, your father says.
sentences.chinese: 還有在全國各地蔓延的疾病和輻射毒害，你父親說。

definition: to harm sb/to inflict suffering/to victimize/pernicious
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to cause a lot of trouble/to inflict much suffering
